author: samwilsn
content:
Summary of today's EIPIP call:

Recommendation for <@552133098075193354> 's https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6991: Change it from exhaustive to current, remove table of activations, and go towards final. Any future activation mechanisms can live in their own EIPs, and require this one.

License discussion: agreed we can prevent `UNLICENSED` code with the license checker. Lots of other discussion about licenses but no decision. Discussion here: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/14329

EIP-4804: Substantial update, looking for input from author.

More details here: https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/232

author: samwilsn
content: <@365300888354422794> just a heads up that I let the 6968 authors know they could open a new pull request and keep the same number, if they need to. I think Kevin is away for the time being (or something.)
